meanings.sent2: The dark clouds befrets the villagers before the storm.
meanings.sent3: The thought of losing his favorite toy befrets the young boy.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the abandoned house befrets the curious explorers.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind befrets the lonely traveler in the forest.

meanings.definition: To adorn or decorate with fretwork
meanings.sent1: She befrets the picture frame with intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman befrets the wooden door with beautiful carvings.
meanings.sent3: The artist befrets the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: The baker befrets the cake with delicate icing patterns.
meanings.sent5: The gardener befrets the garden gate with ornate metalwork.

meanings.definition: To cover or surround with frets
meanings.sent1: The ivy befrets the old stone wall.
meanings.sent2: The vines befrets the entrance to the secret garden.
meanings.sent3: The snow befrets the branches of the trees in winter.
meanings.sent4: The fog befrets the landscape, creating a mystical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The spiderwebs befrets the forgotten attic, adding to its eerie charm.
